amendment.description: To amend title XXXIII of the Public Health Service Act with respect to funding for the World Trade Center Health Program.

action.text: Amendment SA 1065 under the order of 7/26/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 4. Record Vote Number: 206.

Amendment SA 1065 proposed by Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3722-3723) To amend title XXXIII of the Public Health Service Act with respect to funding for the World Trade Center Health Program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1065 proposed by Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1065 under the order of 7/26/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 4. Record Vote Number: 206.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1065 under the order of 7/26/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 4. Record Vote Number: 206.
